crypto.name: Anarkhia
crypto.desc: Amidst the swirling tempest of chaos, seeds of creation take root, birthing new possibilities from the depths of uncertainty.

crypto.name: Astynomoi
crypto.desc: Imbued with an indomitable spirit, the Astynomoi personify unwavering resolve, their unwavering presence a beacon of law and order amidst the darkest of times.

crypto.name: Thermopolium
crypto.desc: Flavors for royalty. Bringing class to cuisine.

misc.name: Charles the GPTCheater IV
misc.desc:
Dont forget to wrap the flag with "flag{}"
Here's an example: flag{1g0t4nsw3rfr0mgpt}

pwn.name: Hades
pwn.desc: Pay attention to the flaw and what to write the message and perhaps corrupt it with your magic!

pwn.name: Themis
pwn.desc: To start solving this challenge, you need to quickly call 59-59-59, get out of the matrix!

rev.name: Catch the fox
rev.desc:
The flag is in three parts. The middle part is a number.
Concatenate the three parts to get the full flag.

rev.name: City Of Titans
rev.desc: You must've picked the true ancient scroll so that the Titan is satisfied by the poem inside, but be careful since the devil may whispers and steals it right away letter by letter!

rev.name: Land of Athens
rev.desc: Might be a secret message which Bob may retrieve once if he could explore an invisible path on the side where human is nowhere to be found.
